com.mumfrey.liteloader.permissions

Class PermissionsManagerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mumfrey.liteloader.permissions.PermissionsManagerClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener, CommonPluginChannelListener, LiteMod, Exposable, PermissionsManager, PluginChannelListener

    public final class PermissionsManagerClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements PermissionsManager, PluginChannelListener
    This class manages permissions on the client, it is a singleton class which can manage permissions for multiple client mods. It manages the client/server communication used to replicate permissions and serves as a hub for permissions objects which keep track of the permissions available on the client.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

      • sendPermissionQuery

        public void sendPermissionQuery(Permissible mod)
        Send a permission query packet to the server for the specified mod. You do not need to call this method because it is issued automatically by the client permissions manager when connecting to a new server. However you can call use this method to "force" a refresh of permissions when needed.
        Parameters:
        mod - mod to send a query packet for

      • registerPermission

        public void registerPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        Register a permission for all mods, the permission will be prefixed with "mod.all." to provide a common namespace for client mods when permissions are replicated to the server.
        Parameters:
        permission -

      • registerModPermission

        public void registerModPermission(Permissible mod,
                                  java.lang.String permission)
        Register a permission for the specified mod, the permission will be prefixed with "mod.." to provide a common namespace for client mods when permissions are replicated to the server.
        Parameters:
        mod -
        permission -

      • getModPermission

        public boolean getModPermission(Permissible mod,
                                java.lang.String permission)
        Get the value of the specified permission for the specified mod. The permission will be prefixed with "mod.." in keeping with registerModPermission as a convenience.
        Parameters:

        permission -

      • getModPermission

        public boolean getModPermission(Permissible mod,
                                java.lang.String permission,
                                boolean defaultValue)
        Get the value of the specified permission for the specified mod. The permission will be prefixed with "mod.." in keeping with registerModPermission as a convenience. If the permission does not exist, the specified default value will be returned.
        Parameters:
        mod -
        permission -
        defaultValue -
